Shortness of breath in pregnancy 
• S
hortness of breath is common among healthy women with normal pregnancies and is considered a normal
physiologic response to pregnancy.
• However, shortness of breath may also be the result of underlying heart or lung pathology.
• Women presenting with any red flags e.g. difficulty in breathing, systolic blood pressure of <100mmHg, heart
rate >120 beats per minute o
